You sighed and decided to turn her into a girly girlfriend, just like you've always dreamed of having. It goes against your morals, but it's only going to be for 24 hours after you take the wig off. Why not see what she's like as a girly girl? What's the worse that could happen?

"Oh, whatever did I put this on for? I look absolutely dreadful!" she says in a strange english accent.

Strange, you think. You didn't mention anything about accents. I guess she's acting like what she thinks of as a girly girl.
"I'll go to the mall and buy something more... fabulous" she said, then looked down at her dirty nails. "Oh! How filthy!" She said, and then turned to you. "Grant dearest, do you know anywhere nearby I can get some fabulous makeup? I can't go to the mall looking like this." She asked, batting her eyelashes.
"Umm, I don't know about 'fabulous', but I guess you can borrow some of my little sister's make up" you stammer, unused to this new 'Julie'.
"Oh, thank you so much honey" she said, giving you a quick kiss on the cheek before heading up to your sisters room.

3 hours later, you were on the bus with your dolled-up girlfriend. She had absolutely caked her face with makeup, and looked like completely different girl with this much make up on. She sat up straight with both hands on her lap. She still wore the wig and the clothes she had been 'disgusted' with, because she had been unable to find any 'appropriate attire' that would fit her at your house. Nervously, you put your hand on her lap. She took your hand in both of hers and smiled at you brilliantly.
"Anything wrong, dearest?" She asked.
"Ummm... no, I'm fine" you said, faking a smile.

Later, you were waiting at the mall for her to come out of the change room. As she comes out, you stare goggle-eyed at what she is now wearing.
"Well? What do you think? Don't I look absolutely gorgeous?" She said.

1111211122211222221112222222111111112112.content:
"What's that?" Amber's eyelids flutter at the pretty pink crystal.

"Oh, well," Julia clears her throat and giggles nervously. "It's, um..." Julia stealthily looked into her friend's eyes and swallowed. "This, like... thing."

Amber rubs her head, eyes still locked on the rock. "What kinda thing...?"

"It's, ya know..." The blonde scratched the back of her head and tried to avoid eye contact. "A... necklace!"

"Necklace..." Amber giggled, lips curving into a smile. "Neck... less!" She kept giggling and giggling for awhile. She couldn't figure out what was making her so silly today, but whatever it was, it was really funny and got funnier and funnier the longer she laughed!

"Ha!" Julia joined in, smiling sharply. "That's a good one, Amber!"

"Ha ha! Yeah...!" Amber sighed and slowed to a complete stop. And as she stood there with her chest gently pushed out, the occasional giggle breaking the silence, Julia continued staring at the ever spacey sillyhead.

Not that she could notice anymore. Her IQ was sunk. At a pitiful 79, she was the bimbo now. Her brain barely sputtered along at a walking pace compared to the brisk and sleek speeds she managed before, and anyone within earshot could tell by her "umms" and "likes" and whiny, breathy voice.

Satisfied and smartfied, Julia crossed her arms and grinned. "So," She sad sardonically, fully aware of what people like Amber said behind her back. "How does it feel to be a dummy, dummy?"

"Oh, nothing important." Julia waved her hand dismissively. "I was just wishing you luck."

"Luck?" Amber's lips parted while her finger drifted instinctively to her lip.

"Of course!" Julia smiled bright and big for her buddy. "You have a big math test today, right?"

Amber gasped and clasped her hand around Julia's. "Oh my gawd! You are so right!"

"Did you forget again, you sillyhead?" Julia said in a saccharine tone.

"I totally did!" A giggle escapes her lips as she raps her knuckles against her much emptier head.

Julia scoffed. "And people say I'm the blonde."

"But..." Amber tilted her head. "You are blonde."

"Don't worry your pretty little head about it, sweetheart." Julia ruffled the dumber girl's hair, much to her pleasure. "Just go out there and do your best!"

Amber liked it when people told her what to do. "Okay!" It made her feel warm and fuzzy on the inside and took a lot of the stress away from her brain. "I'll do my best!"

Watching the girl practically skip down the hall, Amber broke into genuine, unrestrained laughter. "Oh, Amber...!" This would be good. "I'm sure you will."

The bimbo turned nerd rubbed her head, intelligent eyes focused and searching for answers. Her body was different and thinking seemed to have gotten easier. The name bimbo girl didn't fit anymore, clearly, so... how about Genius Woman? She grinned at the thought of how much more power laid in her enhanced brain. With genius girl gone who could stop her?

But... "One thing at a time..."

While there were infinite possibilities to what her adversary's gadget had done, it was clear by the symmetrical outcomes that, most likely, she had--

"Ha! Like, totally got you!"

Oh, today is going to be quite fun. "Yes, dear, yes you did." She grinned and walked elegantly up to the blonde, then kneeled. She was giggling softly and sat flat on her ass and splayed her legs out tellingly. "You took away all my beauty and uglified me!" She gave a fake sob and sniffled. "Whatever will I do now?"

"Serves you right, you, um...!" The ditz didn't look very worried about why words weren't coming to her anymore. Instead, she sneered and pointed a loose finger at her slightly crooked nose and cried, "Meanie!"

The dumbed down genius broke into a hysterical giggle fit and rolled over, immensely pleased with herself. "Life must be so much more pleasant with a small brain." But, in doing so, dropped her device and exposed herself. "Perhaps you'd like to tell me about it?" And with the activation of the device, her impressive brain filled further and the airhead's mind grew smaller.

1111211122211222221112222222111111112112.content:
The former genius girl giggled as the ray blasted her brains to oblivion. "What're you doin' ta me...?" Her voice pitch shifted with every word to higher and higher heights, gaining a cute and girlier sway after every giggle.

"Oh, don't worry about that." Genius Woman laughed sadistically, practically slurping up the remains of her toy's microscopic intellect "In fact, don't worry about anything! Just let me do the thinking from now on, and let yourself go."

The poor girl's shoulders slumped and her smile deepened. "Go...?"

"Yes." The villainess soothed, watching the blonde's thoughts empty and her chest swell. "Let... go...!" She soothed, finger easing off the trigger.

Looking at her now, it was clear the word bimbo fit--if a bit loosely. Though there would need to be a... modifier to that word. Something which would truly convey how vapid, how busty, how helpless the girl was and how far she'd fallen. Until she'd giggled and looked up with the most innocent of blue eyes, Genius Woman wasn't entirely sure her new toy could think for herself but the ghost of her mind could struggle on--if barely.

But she wasn't interested in the doll's mind. To her, the prize was the body. More than mass, it was wrapped and packaged in pink, tantalising, skin tight fabric with vulgar, provocative statements labelling her tits and ass as if she was somehow aware of her new role in life. All that was missing was a name. She didn't know Genius Girl's original name offhand, but perhaps she could do a parody of that.

1111211122211222221112222222111111112112.content:
"I suppose I'll just call you what you are, Bimbo Girl." Genius Woman laughed a haughty bit, and lifted the girl to her feet. "Do you like that? Do you like being the sluttiest girl? The dumbest blonde?" She had to laugh. "Stop playing with your boobs for a second and listen!"

"Huh?" The dumbed down Bimbo Girl had to purse her lips and struggle to think.

"Follow me." But following directions didn't take too much brainpower. Dogs could learn simple commands, and she was still smarter than them. "Okay?"

"Mmm..." She put a finger to her lip and thought about it for a couple seconds. "Kay!" Then fell into a fit of giggles.

"So, Bimbo Girl?" The frizzy haired genius adjusted her glasses. "How's the new brain treating you?"

"Uhhh... Good?" She seemed to ask for approval with every word.

"That's good." She nodded and smiled, and the blonde followed suit. It was nice to have someone who knew their place. "And those incommodious breasts of yours?"

"Oh, they're super nice!" Bimbo Girl sighed and cradled her girls.

It was surprising to hear her speak so confidently. Of course, the tone and dialect was all very valley girl, but she seemed capable enough to string simple words and phrases together. Perhaps she'd properly test her once they returned to her new secret lair.

Closing the apartment door behind her, the villainous Genius Woman shivered. Puffy pink curtains draped her rose-tinted windows (the metaphor must have been a coincidence, for her former self was not smart enough to get it) and stuffed animals decorated her bed. It looked almost childish. All it was missing was a bookshelf of children's literature and toys scattered across the room for it to be mistaken for a little girl's residence.

Her lair was still the same vapid pink that she recalled, but it would've been ridiculous to assume such a device could change reality. The ex-Genius was smart, but not that smart.

"Whoa!" The new and improved Genius Girl's mouth was fully dropped. "This place is, like, so cool!!" Her eyes sparkled with childlike joy as her senses were overwhelmed with unsubtle sights and scents of roses.

"Of course it is, dear." Genius Woman sighed and walked to the closet. "Now come over here so we can move along."

"Aww, but I wanna stay here!" The blonde pouted and whined, taking small but steady steps towards Genius Woman. "It's so soft and pretty...!"

When the girl finally arrived, she merely patted her on the empty head and said, "We'll come back later." Then tapped thrice on the closet door.

And suddenly, the floor below them gave way to a trapdoor.

Then he had her pull up the hood of the hoodie on top of the cap. Now, unless someone looked closely, they just saw her face and the bill of the cap, none of her hair. "Oh, I think you are doing great. Besides, you really want those boxers right?"

"Well, yeah, but..."

"Julie, I think you should be okay with how you are dressed and smell."

Julie shook her head. What was she complaining about? This was just like wearing one of her costumes. She didn't need to be embarrassed. "You're right, this is fine, let's get going."

Grant nodded and the two walked downstairs. As they were walking, he realized something was ruining the illusion of Julie's masculinity. He thought about it, and realized that she was still walking like a girl, with narrow steps and a dainty gait. And her posture was too straight.

"Julie, I think you should walk like a man would when you're wearing mens clothing."

Julie stopped walking. That made sense. If she was dressed like a man, she might as well walk like a man. Without thinking about it any further, her body adopted a more masculine posture. She slouched a little, not worrying about whether her chest stuck out or not. She also walked with a wider gait, as though she had something between her legs. "Should we ask your mom to drive us?" Julie asked.

"No, Julie, I think you and I should ride our bikes." Julie nodded.

The two teenagers biked to the mall. Once there, the two strutted down the walkways until they reached a mens clothing store. Grant helped Julie pick out four packs of boxers that would fit her, but still be loose and comfortable like she now wanted. She gave them to Grant to buy, but he just shook his head.

"Julie, I think you should buy your own boxers, it won't be weird for you to buy mens underwear since you seem to be a man."

Julie thought about it, and what Grant said made sense. She was embarrassed earlier about being seen as a girl buying boxers. But thanks to Grants clothes and suggestions, she didn't really look like a girl. She didn't even smell like one. She went up to the female cashier and bought the boxers, using a deep voice to sound like a guy. Grant chuckled inwardly the whole time.

As they were walking back to the mall entrance, they ran into Julie's friend Trish.

"Hey Grant, whose your friend.... omigod! Julie, is that you!" Trish practically screamed.

"Hey Trish," Julie said, blushing. Her earlier confidence about seeming like a boy disappeared in the face of seeing someone she knew.

"What on earth are you wearing?!" Trish demanded. Julie tried to think of something to say.

"Oh you know Julie, she is always trying on new disguises. She wanted to try this skater boy one, just to see if people would recognize her." Grant said, making up an excuse.

"Well... I admit, that's a bit weird, but you always did like your costumes," said Trish. Julie laughed nervously.

"Yeah, that's it alright. Just trying on a costume on a lazy Saturday." It was then that Grant came up with an idea.

"Julie, I think you should invite Trish over later tonight so you two can catch up, and you can tell her all about it."

"Yeah Trish, want to come over later? We can catch up," Julie asked.

"I guess, just promise me you won't be wearing this."

"Ha ha, sure thing Trish."

"Okay, I'll see you tonight then. Bye you two." With that, Trish walked off.

"I can't believe I did this. What was I thinking? I'm lucky Trish was the only person who recognized me," Julie said dejectedly.

"Yeah, but you got your boxers didn't you? That should make you happy." Julie didn't understand why, but it did make her happy. She and Grant made it to their bikes and rode back to his house.

"Julie, I think you should change back into your clothes (except for the boxers) and go home, but you should invite me to come over tonight before Trish." Julie thought that was a good idea.

"Yeah, why don't I change and go home, but you should come over later. Trish will probably get there about 8, so why don't you come over at 7?"

"Sounds great."

Julie felt strange. For some reason, she knew Grant had done something, but she wasn't sure what. She scratched her head.

Julie wanted to scream 'Because they don't!', but try as she might, she couldn't. She knew she didn't like girls. Girls with blonde wavy hair and impeccable makeup like her friend Trish. "Yeah, I know. It took me a while to come to terms with it. But I've always been a tomboy, and I think it's because I've always felt more attracted to girls than like a girl myself."

Julie just listened as she continued the conversation without any of her own consent. "Yeah, I guess we do have that in common. So what else can I do for tonight?"

Sandra, a tough looking goth girl, had heard the fight between Becca and Julie over her headphones on the other side of the locker room. She loved a good fight but decided to listen in before making any moves.

Julie took the wig out of her bag and placed it on Becca. "Ok Becca, whenever you hear the phrase 'little brat' you will become a sweet little five your old girl named Tina who loves to play. You are obsessed with toys and princesses, and you have no modesty. When you are Tina, you will have no memory of Becca, and when you are Becca you will have no memory of Tina. When you are Tina, you will see me as your big sister who you will listen to. Lastly, you will forget about ever having a fight with me. Understand?"

"Yes," Becca replied in a monotone voice.

"Great!" Julie laughed as she took off the wig. This will finally show everyone her squad does not run the school. "Good moves out there, Becca. I'll see you in class tomorrow!"

"Whatever" Becca said regaining her sense of self.

"Back off, before I catch something, creep" Becca replied.

"You don't have to be such a 'little brat'."

Becca blinked. Her angry eyes were replaced with wide eyes of curiosity. "Hey, lady, why you got so many drawings on your arm and thingys on your face.?" Becca sat on the floor and started swaying.

"These are my tattoos, and these are my piercings..." Sandra could not believe this was actually real.

1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.content:
By the time school started the next day, Julie had returned Grant to his normal persona without him having any memory of his other jock persona. She also filled him in on the situation between Becca and Sandra. Both Julie and Grant unknowingly still carried the costumes of their other personas.

Outside Julie’s locker, they continue to speak while other kids started to make their way to homeroom.

“Wow, this is totally insane. We have the two most feared girls in the school set up to embarrass themselves whenever we want them too” Grant said. They both laughed catching the attention of a few students walking by.
“Is there anyone else we should try this wig on?” Julie asked. “Maybe we could bring a teacher down a level or two, or maybe even the principal!”

Just then, Julie and Grant were interrupted by a very professional looking senior who looked at the couple suspiciously.

“What are you two planning? If you don’t tell me, I will have Principal Wiley herself look in on this matter.” Molly Wagner said.

“Can’t you just mind your business for once, Molly” Julie replied.

“As school president, it is my job to know what is happening on this campus, and it sounds like you two have something you want to share with me.” Molly crossed her arms and waited for an answer.

Grant and Julie looked at each other and exchanged a knowing look. “Ok, we will show you,” Julie said. Julie then reached into her bag and put the wig on Molly before she could say anything in protest.

What did Julie and Grant do to Molly?
1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.title: Grant and Julie almost get busted

1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.content:
Molly’s folded arms fell and she stared straight ahead with a blank expression. The couple examined her trying to figure out the best thing to do.

“Molly is always so high strung and nosy. Let’s try to find a way to make her chill out more often.” Grant said.

“That’s a great idea. As captain of the swim team, debate club, school president, and honor student it will probably help if she just relaxed a bit.

“Not to mention how funny it will be for us,” Grant said. Julie gave him a smirk.

Julie addressed Molly. “When I take the wig off, you will forget ever seeing me and Grant today. Also, whenever you hear the word ‘Chill’ you will no longer think of yourself as Molly. You will become Zeek, a laid-back skater boy, who always acts like he is high. You will be very friendly and relaxed and will spend most of your time trying to impress the chicks at this school. When you are Zeek, you will have no memory of Molly, and when you are Molly, you will have no memory of Zeek. As Zeek, nothing will bother you, and you will always go with the flow. In addition, you will find yourself some baggy clothes and start to wear them when you are Zeek and change out of them when you return as Molly. Anytime someone says “school president” you will return to your normal self, unaware of what had happened as Zeek.”

“Wow, you are really good at these fake personas, Julie. Next thing I know...you're going to try to give me one.” Grant said half-jokingly. Grant thought he was safe given the fact that he could always trigger her to Cindy before she got too carried away and used the wig on him.

“Of course not, we are in this together. I trust you and you trust me.” Julie put on her sweetest smile.

"When you wake up, you will be your normal self and carry on with your day as usual." Julie removed the wig from the school president. She blinked and was on her way
1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.title: From School President to Stoner

1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.content:
Miss Godfrey had quite the day.

During the third period, she caught Sandra stripping clothes off of Becca in the girl's locker room. For some reason, Sandra really wanted to put her "little girl" in her proper clothes which were tiny pink overalls. Becca didn't seem to mind though, as she quietly swung her legs on the bench half-dressed.

After Miss Godfrey dismissed Becca, Becca skipped out of the locker room unconcerned about what happened. When Becca left, Sandra claimed she didn't remember trying to strip Becca and called Miss Godfrey a stupid bitch. That was the first detention of the day.

Then, at lunch, she caught Becca running and throwing food all over the cafeteria giggling, covered in peanut butter and jelly. Her friends didn't seem to know what to make of this either as they tried to stop her from embarrassing herself. When I asked her if this is how a cheerleader should act, she stopped causing havoc and started to wipe off the food from her face. Becca even wondered aloud why she would even buy this sandwich. When Miss Godfrey reprimanded her, Becca said she would never be so immature and annoying. For lying and being an overall nuisance, Miss Godfrey gave out her second detention to Becca.

As Miss Godfrey was leaving, an unfamiliar cheerleader sat down with the rest of the squad. The girl was as bubbly and as ditzy as any cheerleader she had ever seen. Curious, she questioned the girl, "Miss, who are you?"

"Hiya, I am Cyndi," Cyndi said as she started to play with her hair which was obviously a blonde wig. Then, Miss Godfrey recognized the face.

"Wait a minute, I know you, you are Julie Perkins, right?"

"Hehe, who?"

"For Pete's sake! Am I losing my marbles or are you playing some kind of prank."

"I don't know who Pete is, teacher, but I wouldn't prank ya, swearsies"

"Don't mock me, young lady, detention this afternoon" Miss Godfrey went to get some air. This whole place seemed to be going out of control. She couldn't believe Julie of all people was in on this prank. And then, she smelled it.

"Is that pot?" Miss Godfrey followed her nose. There, she found Molly Wagner in a beanie, oversized t-shirt, and jeans, smoking a blunt on the garbage can."

"Excuse me!" Miss Godfrey yelled over.

"What's poppin', Godfrey, want a puff?" 'Zeek" asked in a calm matter as 'he' looked at the clouds.

"Detention! I don't know what kind of weird joke is being played on me, but I am sad to see our star pupil has been roped in as well.

1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.content:
The other cheerleaders could not believe that Becca had announced ‘Cyndie’ as captain of their squad. In particular, the two next-in-line captains, Tiffany and Melanie were furious. And unlike the rest of the squad, they were not buying Becca’s new “nice girl” act.

Despite these problems, the halftime show went on as usual. Julie seemed really committed to her strange prank. She was peppy and enthusiastic, and when the players came back out for the next half, she cheered them on eagerly. She continued to holler at “Matt” who had become the basketball team’s most valuable asset. The crowd seemed to enjoy the energy the new captain brought. Throughout the second half of the basketball game, Becca cheered on both sides as she could not bring herself to root against anyone. This caused some confusion, but most people just shrugged her off.

While Becca was helping an elderly couple to the car, the other cheerleaders gathered their things from the locker room. “What's this wig doing here?” Melanie asked as she picked it off the ground.

“Ew, it probably has a bunch of diseases. Let’s go fuck with Julie and see if we can regain our rightful place as captains.” Melanie followed with the wig in hand. For some reason, she could not put it down.

“Listen, up!” Melanie and Tiffany called out to ‘Cyndie’. She smiled at her two teammates unaware of the problems she had caused them.

“We’ve had enough of your games” Melanie started. ‘Cyndie’ started to look confused and scared. Unlike Julie, ‘Cyndie’ was much more emotional and just wanted to please everyone.

“You think this disguise is fooling us?” Tiffany asked. Suddenly, Julie was back. Why was she crying? Did these two dumb cheerleaders really get to her? Julie failed to notice she was in a cheerleader’s uniform. Just then, Julie saw her chance for vengeance.

“Hey, Melanie, I bet that wig would look really cute on you?” Julie said slyly.

Distracted for a moment, Melanie asked, “You think?” She placed the wig on top of her head and seemed to zone out.

Ignoring Melanie, Tiffany continued at Julie. When she saw Julie’s devilish smile, her anger grew as she was now convinced this was all an act, “You are not a cheerleader!” The smile vanished from Julie as ‘Cyndie’ reemerged as she started to tear up again. “You are Julie, that same flat-chested, nerdy loser who hates cheerleaders and dresses like a boy. You act like you’re so above us, but I bet you only try to embarrass us because it gets you off, perv.”

‘Cyndie’ burst into tears as she headed for a bathroom stall. Tiffany rolled her eyes and waited for some comment from Melanie but she just stood their blankly with her wig on. “Thanks for having my back,” Tiffany said sarcastically. “And take that stupid wig off!” she demanded as she gathered her things and left.

Melanie removed the wig and dropped it to the floor. What was she wearing? She’d never be caught dead in a cheerleader uniform. And what was up with her hair and makeup? Melanie saw Julie’s boyish clothes in her bag and quickly put them on. She wiped off all her make up and let her hair fall naturally, something Melanie normally never did. Being more developed in the chest area, Julie’s shirt clung tightly to Melanie, but she did not seem to mind.

1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.content:
Before Cyndi could say anything else, Grant put the wig back on her head. Instantly, her eyes glazed over.

"You will forget seeing me use the wig on your mother, you will have no memory of what the wig does. If you see me use it again, unless I tell you what it does, you will not notice its mind control powers, you will ignore them and forget anything you see. To you, it is a normal wig."

Grant thought for a second. He really liked the idea of having his girlfriend Julie be a hot blonde whenever he wanted, and he thought this might be something he wanted to continue into the future. With that in mind, he considered what else he might need to think of.

"Also, from now on, if at all possible, if you are Julie and have to go somewhere, you will bring a spare set of Cyndi clothes, makeup, and the wig in case you have to change. If you are Cyndi and you go somewhere, if possible, you will bring a set of Julie clothes. Also, if I switch you back from one personality to the other, and something cannot change back to the way it was, your mind will make up an excuse for why it is in its current state. Also, from now on, this will be Julie's bedroom only. Cyndi's bedroom will be the guest bedroom across the hall. When you are Julie, you will not notice that the other bedroom is set up as though you have a sister. When you are Cyndi, same thing, you won't notice Julie's bedroom. When I take the wig off, you will wake up as Cyndi. You will take all of Julie's girliest outfits and put them in your bedroom closet, then take anything else out of this room that is too girly for Julie, because you want it for yourself, and put it in your room. Then you will close up this door and ignore it until you are Julie."

With that, Grant took the wig off Julie's head. She blinked a few times as her eyes re-focused.

"Hey Grant, want to help me move some stuff out of this guest bedroom?" she asked.

"Sure Cyndi, just give me a minute first." Cyndi nodded and began pulling the girliest outfits out of the closet.

Grant took the wig and went downstairs. He snuck up behind Julie's mom and placed it on her head. "Whenever your daughter is blonde, she is Cyndi. When she is Cyndi, her bedroom is in the guest room across the hall from Julie's. When she is Cyndi, you will ignore Julie's room. When she is Julie, you will ignore Cyndi's room. When I take off the wig, you will wake up thinking Cyndi is your daughter right now. You will help her move any girly things out of Julie's room into her room, then you two will go to the mall and buy clothes, accessories, makeup, and other possessions for Cyndi. You will also get another cell phone with a different number and give it to her."

Grant then took the wig off her mom's head. As she woke up, he followed her upstairs.

"Cyndi, let me help you with that," her mom said, taking an armful of clothes. "In fact, I think you could use some more clothes. Why don't you and I head to the mall?"

"But mom, Grant's here," Cyndi whined, something Julie never did.

"That's okay Cyndi. Why don't you go to the mall with your mom now, and we can go out on a date tonight? What do you say, I'll pick you up at 7:00?"

"Okay!" said Cyndi, giggling happily. Another thing Julie would never be caught dead doing. Grant could barely keep from laughing at how different she was acting.

"Great, see you tonight."

Grant spent the afternoon using the wig on his family members to make sure that each of them were programmed to think of Julie as Cyndi whenever she was wearing the blonde wig, to not know about Julie when Cyndi was around, and vice versa. He also played around with his siblings for a bit, but nothing with any long-term consequences. Finally, 7:00 rolled around and Grant heard the doorbell ring. He went downstairs and opened the door to a surprising sight.

On the front porch was Julie. Or more accurately, Cyndi, because she looked nothing like Julie ever looked like. She was wearing a pink strappy dress that showed off her arms and lots of her back. The dress also displayed her cleavage in a way Julie would never have been comfortable with. She was wearing her blonde wig, but it had been styled so it was hanging down to her shoulders in loose waves. Cyndi was wearing high-heeled open-toed shoes and actual jewelery: bracelets and rings, a necklace, and dangly earrings. Grant was also astounded to see she was wearing makeup, since Julie never wore much more than a little lipstick. Cyndi, however, had on pink lipstick, blush, and sparkling blue eyeshadow. She had also obviously had her nails done, because now both her finger and toenails were immaculately shaped and painted a light pink shade. All in all, she looked like the kind of girl that Julie hated. He couldn't believe it.

"Hey Grant. Looking good stud," Cyndi said, looking him up and down appreciatively. "Ready to go out?"

"You bet babe!" Grant said, a little to eagerly. He grabbed Cyndi's arm in his and the two walked to his car.

1111211122211222221122121121212121111122.content:
Grant's first thought was to take Cyndi out on a date to the mall. He had always tried to get Julie to go out with him before, but she wasn't big for public dates, and she especially wasn't a fan of going to the mall. But Cyndi was completely different. As soon as Grant suggested it, her eyes lit up.

The two teenagers had dinner at an Italian restaurant adjoined to the mall. Grant enjoyed talking with Cyndi and observing just how different she was from Julie, even though they were in reality the same girl. As Cyndi, she had a very bubbly and outgoing personality. She not only loved to talk, but she even talked with her voice in a higher pitch than she usually did as Julie. She also used the word "like" much more frequently, as well as giggling whenever she thought something was funny. Grant was a little disappointed to realize that, as Cyndi, she was less interested in some of the things he and Julie had in common, and was more interested in girly things like fashion and celebrity gossip. This surprised him, since he knew Julie didn't care about that kind of thing at all. He wondered if the Cyndi personality was drudging up information that Julie had been exposed to but thought she ignored, or if Cyndi had spent half the afternoon reading fashion and gossip magazines. Either way, he marveled at the power of the wig.

After dinner, they went to a movie. Cyndi really wanted to see the newest rom-com, another unintended side effect. He and Julie would have gone and seen a drama or an action movie, but Cyndi had no interest in those. Grant reluctantly agreed to the chick flick, bought some popcorn, and the two took their seats in the back. Although he didn't care for the movie, he was pleasantly surprised that Cyndi immediately wanted to hold his hand and cuddle close. As the movie progressed, he decided to take his chances and try kissing her, even though he knew as Julie she would have rejected the public display of affection. But apparently Cyndi thought blondes enjoyed it, because she responded by happily kissing him back. So much so, that they spent most of the second half of the movie making out (and groping a little) in the darkened theater.

Grant was sad when the movie ended, breaking up their makeout session. Cyndi smiled at him coyly and made her way to the bathroom to "freshen up her makeup." Another thing Julie never did. Grant waited for her, then walked out of the theater hand in hand with his blonde girlfriend. It was time to head home. But did they make it?

Click the button from the same range again to end the trance. Afterward, they will remember carrying out orders, but perceive their actions as entirely normal."
You hand Julie the watch back and tell her "Julie, when I remove the wig from your head, you will begin exercising your hypnotic influence on people..."

choices: Have Julie's mom put on a costume
Go find someone else to hypnotize. A new subject sounds fun!
111121112221122222112212112121212121211.content:
Julie settles on the idea of entrancing her own mother first. She's a familiar face, and Julie knows how easily she'll fall for a trick. You follow her downstairs as she twirls the pocketwatch in her hand. Once in the kitchen, Julie calls for her mother. Julie's mom comes to the kitchen as well, wondering what it is her daughter needs of her.
Within seconds of Julie's mom stepping into the kitchen, Julie walks up to her, and presses the button of the watch and says "SLEEP!" Julie's mom now in a deep trance, Julie spends a moment pondering what commands to give her.
After a moment or two, with an excited look on her face, Julie speaks up... "Mom, when I snap my fingers, you will act like a model. A famous model at a photo shoot, and Grant here is your photographer." And then you hear a loud *SNAP* from Julie.
Instantly, her mom comes to life. She says in a slightly uppity yet professional tone "alright, let's get started. What should I do first?" You fumble to pull your phone out, glad that you bought the latest uPhone (it has an impressive camera), and described some improvised ideas for poses. Every minute or so, a new pose, and a few new pictures on your phone. After about eight or nine poses, Julie turned to her mom and once again said "SLEEP!" And just like that, her mom was in a blissful trance again. Next, Julie commanded her mom "This time when I snap my fingers, mom, you'll be a college professor giving a lecture on... hmm... using food as sex toys." and a moment later, *SNAP*
Julie's mom straightened her clothes, stood stiffly, looked at some imaginary notes, and began speaking. "Alright class, settle down. Today, we'll be discussing the alternatives to typical sex toys and self-stimulating items. Today, we'll be discussing food in place of such items. Many meats, vegetables, and fruits work for such an endeavor. For example, you may find that cucumbers, bananas, carrots, or even hot dogs are the right shape. Anything phallic that has been properly sanitized will do. You'd be surprised by how many people practice acts or please themselves using this method. I myself have-" "SLEEP!" Julie practically yelled, knowing exactly where her mom was going, and not wanting to listen any further.
Julie decided on her final command, and spoke "okay Mom, go grab me all the cash in your wallet." She said, her voice uneasy. She was still clearly trying to evade the thoughts of her mom doing such a thing. When Julie's mom returned, she handed Julie over two hundred dollars. Julie was distracted by counting it for a moment, but when she finished, she turned to her still hypnotized mother and said "Mom, after this trance, go rest until tomorrow or until one of us comes to get you. Any time in the future that Grant or I ask a favor of you, you'll do it and do it gladly. Also you'll wear any costume or outfit or accessory we ask you to without a thought. Is that clear?" "mmmyesss" her mother mumbles groggily.
Julie stands next to her mother and hits the button on the pocketwatch. After a few moments, Julie's mom said a quick goodbye to you both and headed to her room.
Julie turned to you and asked who you wanted to hypnotically play around with next. You request...
111121112221122222112212112121212121211.title: Yes. Messing with her mom sounds fun!

You mosey on over to Julie's chest of costumes, and dig around before finding the perfect one. You grab it, and turn around to show Julie. She grins when she sees that you're holding...

Julie clears her throat and adopts her best comic book narrator voice. "When we last left our hero, a mild-mannered mom was transforming into her secret identity, the incredible Mega Mom! Using her incredible super powers, she fights for truth, justice, and freedom! In today's adventure, Mega Mom fights..."

"Mega Mom comes across Miss Menace and her henchmen plotting something fiendish in her hideout!" Julie narrates. You pass out uniforms for the henchmen and an outfit for Miss Menace herself. A revealing black number. Perfect to menace the chaste-for-now hero. Julie continues while they change. "Will Mega Mom's incredible super powers be able to defeat Miss Menace's..."

Musings aside, you rush over to Julie's mom's room. You pop in quietly and hold out the costume in front of you. Julie's mom sees you as she sits up, and she sees the costume a moment later and knows exactly what you want. Julie enters the room as her mom begins undressing and putting on the costume.

1111211122211222221122121121212121212111.content:
The costume had a subtle effect. Fleeting images of you and Julie kissing your goddess' feet, rubbing her shoulders, feeding her food, fanning her, etc, all flash through your mind in an instant. You snap back to reality, forgetting what just happened. But you feel oddly attracted to Julie's mom now; more than you had before, at least. Julie's mom laid back down on her bed and began watching TV.
"Grant, want to grab a bite in the kitchen? I'm hungry." Julie suggested.
"Sounds good, I think I need some food in me." You agreed.

As you snack and chat with Julie about the potential of Julie's hypnotic prowess, you have another vision like before. Only this one was slightly longer: clearer in your mind's eye. You feel yourself get slightly warmer at the thought of Julie's mom, but cannot figure out why you feel this way all of a sudden.

"Hey Grant! You still with me, buddy?" Julie asks, waving a hand in front of your face. You snap back to reality, and Julie has your attention. "Are you feeling okay?" She asks.
"Yeah, just wondering why your mom seemed so attractive all of a sudden." You think out loud, for Julie to hear.
"You too? I've felt the same thing! It's weird, because it's my mom, but also... I dunno, a really nice thought, in a way..." Julie trailed off. "Anyways! Want to see if she's hungry too? I bet she'd like a snack" Julie said, seemingly back to normal.
It sounds like a good idea, but something still seems off...

Stick around. Julie's mom needs you more than whatever is going on at home.
1111211122211222221122121121212121212111.content:
You begin cutting up some fruit and cheeses, and Julie grabs a tray to place them on for serving. At home when your mom made you do this for family gatherings, you hated it. But at the moment, it felt good. It felt right. Unsure why, but not really caring anymore, you and Julie placed the various foods on the tray. Laid out in the shape of a heart, you and Julie take a moment to be sure the food looks good and presentable.
Julie grabs the tray, and is off to her mom's room. You follow her quickly, to be sure you're there when Julie offers her mom the munchies you helped prepare.
You get to the room just after Julie. "...and so we thought you might be a little hungry..." you heard Julie saying as you entered the room. Clearly she wasted no time in bringing your offering in.
"Thank you, how thoughtful!" Julie's mom said, grinning. "I feel like a princess! ... hmmm, no, goddess sounds better. I could get used to this!"
"Glad you like it! Is there anything else we can do for you?" You hear yourself say.
Wait... we're not some servants for Julie's mom... WE hypnotized HER! you think to yourself. But as soon as the thought came, it went. Returned, were stronger thoughts and images of pampering Julie's mom like... well, a goddess.

Julie's mom spoke up, breaking your train of thought, "Well, the house does need to be vacuumed, and the laundry never got finished earlier. You kids could do that for me, can't you?"
"Gladly! I'll get the laundry, Grant. You can vacuum!" Julie chirped, and rushed downstairs. You grabbed the vacuum out of the closet and began sucking up dirt from the floor. Halfway through the chore though, something got caught in the vacuum. You turn it off and examine the issue. You find a small card that looks like it came out of a magical item, like the ones you found with your wig and Julie's watch. It read "Warning! This costume is extremely powerful! All persons who stare at the wearer for more than 3 seconds slowly become obsessed with serving and obeying the wearer as if they were actually a deity to be worshiped! Proceed with extreme caution!"
Oh no! Is that what's going on?!? You think for a fleeting moment, before your mind goes blank for a moment. When your thoughts return, the card is in your pocket, and you realize the vacuum is no longer jammed. You resume vacuuming and eventually finish doing it throughout the whole house.

Julie got done with the laundry around the same time. You show her the card, and she reads it. She seems wholly unconcerned, and convinced it's just a coincidence, but you aren't so sure.
As you regroup to see if Julie's mom needs anything more, your cell phone rings. Your own mother wants you home ASAP for dinner.
Do you go home and try to figure out what thoughts are really yours? Or do you stay, wanting to serve Julie's mom more, like she deserves?
1111211122211222221122121121212121212111.title: Yes, go offer Julie's mom a snack.

You exited the room, went to the closet and took feather dusters. The thought of following your mistress's command filled you both with bliss. You would do anything for her! You walked into the living room and begun dusting. With every furniture you dusted, your devotion to Julie's mother grew even stronger. It didn't take you long to finish your task. Once again you were on your way to mistress's room. You entered it and saw mistress waiting for you. "Did you finish?" she asked. "We did, mistress." Julie answered.
You saw your mistress smiling. "It almost feels as if you were my maids!" she laughed. It made you think. "Do you want us to be your maids, mistress?" you asked shyly. Julie's mom was surprised by this question. She was looking at you and she knew that this question wasn't a joke. She put her hand on a chin and begun thinking.

Ryan-witch is cackling away in the kitchen, preparing some fiendish brew. Ash-bot is standing silently and statue still by her Queen. You and Julie are...

You pull out the costume. It comes with a beret, a scarf, and, most importantly, a megaphone and one of those folding director's chairs. This one just has "DIRECTOR" printed across the back- apparently, Julie didn't have it personalized. You scan your eyes over the tag and read...

The Hypnowood Director

Put on your own shows, with actors you "train" yourself. Make whatever kind of movie you want, and make sure your actors stay in character with a heaping helping of hypnosis. Your actors will always try their hardest, but it never hurts to give them props and costumes to help bind them to the role. Your actors will pay no attention to you, except to obey any directions you give them over the microphone. Only by making physical contact can you convince them to 'break the fourth wall' and interact with you.

Commands

Action: Sets the scene in motion, either for the first time after outlining it, or after a cut.
Cut: Freezes all actors in place. They can be given directions in this state, but they will not act until 'action' is called.
Take five: Temporarily returns actors to their original minds with no memory of the scene. Calling 'action' will immediately put them back into their role.
That's a wrap: Permanently ends the scene, returning all actors to their original minds with no memory of the scene.

Warnings

Keep your scene short- prolonged exposure to the Director's magic can cause actors to ''stick" to their roles permanently.
Certain characters- especially those of an intelligent or free-spirited nature- have been known to develop hypnotic powers of their own and start to 'audition' others into their play- including the director!

Grant has both of them awake.

“Hey, Juuulie” Julie’s mom says. “I see you are still trying your best to look like a boy.”

“What do you want, sis? I’m busy” Julie replied.

“Over my dead bod-” Julie’s mom snaps and Julie enters a trance-like state.

You will smile and use a dolly voice. When I say undoll, you will return to normal, unaware of the changes I made. Understand?”

“Yes, big sister,” Julie says in a monotone voice.

“Great!” Julie’s mom snaps and Julie returns to normal a bit confused. “You were saying, sis.”

“I said there is no way you are going to give me a makeover,” Julie responded.

“Oh really? Doll.”

Julie’s eyes widened and she put on a big smile. “Hiya’ she said in a high pitched voice. ‘Do you wanna dress me?”

Julie’s mom spent the next hour putting Julie in ridiculous get-ups. She finally settled on the girliest outfit she could find. A white dress with roses on it. Julie’s mom put blush on the smiling Julie. “I look so pretty, thank you!” Julie chirped.

“Undoll.” Julie blinked. She had no idea why her mouth hurt.

“Can you go now? I have to be at school soon.” Julie said impatiently.

“Sure, Julie. Have a great day. Maybe we can do the makeover another day.” Julie’s mom left the room smiling.

111121112221122222112212112121221.content:
"I was thinking that you needed to be punished."

With that, Grant placed the wig on Julie's head. Her eyes took on that familiar glazed over appearance.

"Julie, whenever you do something bad, you are punished by your mother. For almost any wrongdoing, the punishment is for her to take you over her knee and spank you just like you were a little girl, then stand you in the corner for fifteen minutes. You remember that this has been going on your whole life, so it is not strange for you to be spanked at 16 years old. But even though you remember this always happening, every time is extremely embarrassing to you. Also, when she tells you it's time for your spanking, you can try to argue, but once she tells you to get across her knees, you have to obey her. Then you take your spanking without ever trying to run away, and you stand in the corner as long as she tells you. You never think of disobeying her when it comes to this punishment."

Grant thought for a second, then decided that he was still really angry.

"Also, your mother told me about your punishment routine, so I know all about it. It is perfectly normal for you to be punished in front of me if I am over here. When I take off the wig, you will not remember I told you this, you will think that is how it has always been. You will also know that you need to be punished for making me think I was your little sister."

After finishing the instructions, Grant took off the wig. Julie blinked a few times.

"I'm sorry Grant, I shouldn't have done that." she said meekly.

"That's right, but I think you know what you did was wrong." Julie nodded sadly. "That means you need to be punished. Stay here while I go get your mom."

Julie looked down at her feet and sat on her bed as Grant left the room. The door closed, leaving Julie to sit in silence and fret about what was to come. After a few minutes, the door opened back up. Who was there?

"Grant tells me you have something you want to say young lady?" Julie's mom asked in a stern tone.

"I'm sorry mom! I was bad to Grant! Please don't punish me!" Julie sobbed, losing all her typical tomboyish confidence.

"No buts missy, well, other than your soon-to-be-red one. You know the rules." Julie's mom sat down next to her on the bed and pointed to her lap.

"Please, no mom! At least, don't do it in front of Grant!" Julie said tearfully.

"Oh stop your whining, it's nothing he hasn't seen before. Now get across my lap."

Julie sobbed and did as she was told. She laid down across her mother's lap with her butt taking the center position. Julie's mom unbuttoned her pants and pulled them down to her ankles, following those with her panties.

"I think 20 should be enough for this infraction," her mother said. Then she raised her hand and brought it down on her daughter's butt with a loud slap.

"Oww!" squealed Julie.

"What was that? You know the rules, count them out," her mother said sternly.

"O...one..." said Julie weakly.

Her mother continued spanking her. Although the spanks were painful, Julie would probably not have cried at the level of hurt. However, Grant had given her instructions while wearing the wig that after the first 2 or 3 spanks, she would start crying and reacting like a little girl. Only the original master can do this. Any subsequent masters become vulnerable to the wig's power when they transfer ownership.
*The wig can alter memories, but the person returns to normal after 24 hours, or whenever the master chooses.
*The master can brainwash himself with the wig but returns to normal after 24 hours, or whenever the master chooses."

"From now on..... you're MY girlfriend!"
You stared at Ryan, your eyes first pleading with him, then burning with rage. But then it occurred to you that he can't see you, your eyes are towards the back of his head, and you cannot disobey his order to hold him up to Julie's face.

But how could you get back at this little twerp?
You were under his command and forced to do whatever he says...

With the spare time you now had you sat on your bed an thought all the possibilities through, one by one.
"If I could make mom or Ashley help I would have an advantage" you thought "but if he gets this wig on either of their heads I'm done for good..."
Another option would be to protect yourself against his orders...
"Loud music and earplugs should do the trick.." you reasoned with yourself, "but what after that? He made me mentally incapable to take back the mastery of the wig.., I would need HIM to give it back to me, and that doesn't sound very likely", but at least you could try to make a trade..

On the other hand, you didn't really want to trade!

111122111122111211.title: VENGEANCE WILL BE MINE!

1111221111221112112.content:
Ashley was too small and weak to wrestle with Ryan, nor did she have any authority over him. She's good st scheming, but she's not good enough to go against Ryan AND Julie. You couldn't directly interact with Ryan, he had power over you and that was dangerous here. Mom was the only hope, the one shot you had. You went looking for her and prayed that Ryan hadn't gotten to her, and that she could do the job she needed to.
You found her in the back-yard, grilling an early dinner/late lunch. You approached her carefully, and she turned her head to see who it is.
"Oh, hi Grant. Do you need something?"
"Yeah, mom... actually..."
"Grant, is something wrong? Tell me, if something is, don't hesitate!"
"Well mom, it's kind of weird..." you trail off. How would you even begin to explain this to your mom? What would you say?
That you used a magical wig on yourself, and now your little brother has mind control over you? That he made you shit your own pants and took your girlfriend to be his?
Screw it, yeah. That's what you'd do. And you did.
Afterwards... "Grant, that sounds absolutely ridiculous. Please, I have to finish dinner. If you want to let out some creativity, write a story or paint on canvas. You seemed concerned before, but I think you were clearly just nervous to tell anyone such an odd story." And with that, she turned back to her cooking.
"No, mom, really, you have to go see!" You put on a serious, determined face.
"Julie is up in Ryan's room, playing with him and watching cartoons or something. She's probably fawning over him and acting like he's the most interesting person in the world! You have to go see for yourself!?
She stood in contemplation for a moment, and turned back to the grill. "I will go look, as soon as I finish here. Five minutes." You sighed, relieved that this ordeal might end. "But if this is a prank or joke or anything of the sort, so help me god, you will be grounded until you graduate high school." You accepted, desperate to get Julie back.

Time passed, and your mom washed her hands off in the kitchen sink as you rambled to her, "Be careful mom, Ryan might not listen to you, and he may lie to you. Just don't let him put the wig on your head!"
Your mother shook her head as she left the room, and said "Set the table, Grant. When I get back down here we are having dinner, and then I'm taking Ashley to spend the night at a friend's house. You'd better have all this nonsense out of your system by the time I get home."
And as per your programming, you began doing just that. You heard her walk up the stairs...

Meanwhile:
Mom entered Ryan's room to see Ryan and Julie watching a cartoon and Ryan telling Julie all about his favorite characters. They heard her enter and turned around to face her. They greeted her, and she asked "Julie, why are you in here with Ryan instead of spending time with Grant?"
Julie replied "Grant was acting weird, and Ryan seemed like he needed come company, so I decided to spend some time with the little angel." She said, rustling his hair and smiling.
It was then that mom noticed the wig on Julie. "Julie, is that one of your costume wigs? I haven't seen that one before..."

"Alright, well dinner in a few minutes. Be downstairs quickly, you two." Mom said, and turned to leave.

Ryan looked at her, confused. Why wasn't she acting like a zombie?
Then he remembered, "Oh, duh, i have to take the wig off her" and he did just that.
Gone, was mom's stiff attention stance. She was now a bumbling zombie, walking around upstairs, bumping into things, arms outstretched. Sometimes she would let out a quiet groan, or drool on her shirt as her mouth hung agape.

Ryan commanded Ashley to stand up and walk with him to another room and ordered you to stay in the kitchen with the others. Ashley mindlessly followed. After a few minutes went by, Ashley re-entered the room, the wig in her hands. She put it on your mom, and told her to go see Ryan. Ashley then sat down at the table and finished her dinner mindlessly as your mom left. When your mother came back, she put the wig on Julie, told her to go see Ryan, and began putting dishes in the dish-washer. You were getting nervous, knowing Ryan was up to something. You also noticed that your mom was still wearing her messy clothes, and had only cleaned her face and hands after her meal as a zombie.
Finally, Julie returned with the wig, heading right towards you. You tried to squirm and move out of her way, but Ryan's command to stay put won out, and Julie was eventually able to grab hold of you and put the wig on your head. Everything went dark.
Suddenly, you woke up, and everything seemed normal. Everyone was on the couch, except Ryan, who was nowhere to be seen. Your mom turned on the TV, and put on the latest episode of Teen Titans GO. You vaguely remember thinking the show was stupid before, but you brushed away the thought. It's your family's favorite show to watch together, especially when Julie is over. You all watched raptly, completely absorbed in the terrible animated abomination before you. When the credits rolled, Julie stood up excitedly and announced "Oh my gosh, that episode was amazing!" Everyone enthusiastically agreed. Julie continued by saying "I have an idea! Let's all pick characters from the show, dress up as them, and act it out!" Suddenly, you felt a strong urge to agree, and agree you did. To your surprise, so did your mom. Ashley did too, though you expected her to enjoy it as she always liked dressing up.
Everyone piled into the mini-van. Your mom would drive, with Julie, yourself, and Ashley in the back seat, with the front seat oddly empty...
Julie suggested going to the costume store down the street for outfits. But on the way there, your mom suddenly turned to Julie's street, and stopped in her driveway. After a moment, the front passenger door opened, and then closed. You didn't find this at all unusual. The old car acted up sometimes, but your mom never seemed to want to replace it. After a bit, Julie's mom came out and crawled over everyone in the back seats, taking one in the far back for herself. The front passenger door opened and closed like it had before, and once again you were all off to the costume store.
The excitement was unbearable, but finally the group arrived. Everyone raced in to the store, and quickly found costumes. You picked Robin, your mom picked Raven, Julie picked Cyborg, Ashley picked Beast Boy, and Julie's mom picked Starfire. Your mom pays for the costumes and you all rush back to your house.
You all started stripping and putting on the costumes right there in the foyer as soon as you stepped foot inside. You thought you heard giggling as the group undressed, but nobody was making any sounds or faces. Everyone was focused on getting into their new outfits. You pushed all thoughts aside, and got into your costume too. Again, everything went dark. The next thing you know, you ARE Robin, and you see your fellow Titans in the control center of Titans Tower, ready for the day. Shenanigans ensue, and you all have crazy, wacky adventures. After a crazy night on missions and cleaning up the results of your mayhem, you retire to your room, as do the others.

The next morning, you woke with a headache. Nevertheless, you jumped out of bed but before leaving the room, you had flashbacks. Ryan figured out that you made yourself obey your family, he took over the family (and Julie's), and then... nothing... You shrugged your shoulders, grateful that soon, the 24 hours of familial servitude would be over, and maybe you could formulate a plan to get your wig back.
But as you left your room to get breakfast, and maybe a painkiller for your head, you heard Ryan laughing hysterically from downstairs. You go to see what's so funny, but all that's on the screen is a real life recording of that stupid Teen Titans GO show he loves so much. You recall hating the show, that the original Teen Titans was far superior. And you find it odd that this episode is live-action. But again, you shrug your shoulders. "Maybe it's a special episode or something." You say to nobody in particular, and enter the kitchen.
There, you find Ashley, Julie, your mom, and Julie's mom. Everyone is eating breakfast, or grabbing seconds, and you make yourself a bowl of cereal before sitting down.
You feel yourself unable to speak to any of them or do anything but eat. You also notice that the laughter from Ryan had stopped. He enters the room, carrying the wig and a video camera. He sits on Julie's lap, and she showers him in compliments before offering him her microwave pancakes that are floating in syrup. By seeing this, you are reminded that Julie is Ryan's girlfriend now, and that she prefers him and his interests, not yours.

Ryan declines her offer, and turns to you saying "Grant, that 24 hours of obeying me is almost up. I feel kind of nice today, since you all entertained me so well last night, so I might let you go. On the other hand... it was so much fun, I might want to do it again!" He mockingly rubs his chin in thought, and decides...

What does he do?

"Hello, it's nice to meet you. I was thinking of having my daughters attend this school and I've been looking into various curriculum that the school operates have been very impressed. Do you have any personal recommendations, Ms. ..."

"Ms. Hart, I'm the head faculty for the literary department, so I might be a touch biased but I personally recommend the humanities but the science and math faculty are both excellent as well. I just feel, students need to have a strong foundation in art and literacy to really become better members of society." The woman explained.

Mom, feigned a little embarrassment, "Yes, my oldest isn't here right now but I also want to move her to this school but I'm having trouble getting her to listen and getting her prepared for the new curriculum."

According to the booklet, the programs were detailed quizzes and education games with lesson plans and tutorial videos to give the student advice and teach the student information they might have or did not know.

Grant quickly moved past it and began the first series of quizzes, they were all very rudimentary, only at a middle school level. Every time he got a question right, on screen text would briefly congratulate him with a little musical flair and gave experience based on his accuracy and speed of his answers. At the end of each Quiz, he would get a bonus reward for his perfect score. It was simple enough, but it did make Grant more competitive to answer the questions faster to get a higher score.

After the third quiz, Grant followed the instructions and began the first lesson plan. It began with recommendations for his posture while sitting down and playing the game, instructing a straight back would be better for his body while he used the program and that crossing his legs, one over the other, would help maintain his balance, this first section gave smaller tips like the posture of his hands while using the keyboard and mouse, little things that seemed innocuous but still helpful none the less. Grant, already primed by the positive reinforcement from the quizzes, naturally assumed the advice, straightening his back and crossing his legs. Next began the lesson with some school knowledge of a normal middle school curriculum. Grant already knew what the it was teaching but found that he had forgotten the context of some of the answers he knew which the program helped clarify. It was a nice little refresher.

Grant began doing some more quizzes, which were a little bit harder, relative to the previous quizzes but Grant quickly flew through those quizzes as well. “And Grant, were you really going to go out without makeup?”

You blink, stopping in your tracks. “Makeup? I don’t wear makeup.”

Ashley shakes her head. “But you should, silly. It’s scientifically proven to make your face look healthier and younger. It keeps you from getting acne and stuff too. You need to put some on or you’ll look silly.”

info.brief_description: An ordinary high school student discovers a new form of mind control. Over 2,800 Chapters!
info.description:
Please Add!

Note: I have even further relaxed the rules regarding sex, what's allowed, and how exactly the wig works. Have fun!

Hall of fame contributors:
Wordsmitty ✍️ (160)

Characters in this story:
Grant (you) You are a 16-year old high school student. You're rather smart, and have a few good friends.

Ashley, your 10-year-old sister. She's still into princesses and pink things and such. She practically lives on peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.

Ryan, your 9-year-old brother. He's into things like cars and action figures. He likes throwing these things at you and Ashley.

Julie, your girlfriend. She's your age, shares a lot of your interests, and goes to school with you. She's a bit of a tomboy, so she never showed much interest in dolls and such growing up, and doesn't really care about fashion or anything like that, although she does take an interest in costumes and disguises, and she has told you she wants to be a master of disguise when she grows up. She lives near your house, so you see each other pretty often. She is an only child.


In this story, you are the main character (Grant). You can add last names and additional characters as you see fit. This is my first anything for writing.com, so have fun with it. ;)

A few rules, if you please:

*Please use good grammar/spelling. There IS a spell check button!
*Sex is OK. M/M and F/F is just fine.
*Always have a 'Something else' option!
The more you write, the better!

I will award GPs for excellent additions!


Also, here's some guidelines for how the mind control wig works:
*The wig's master is the first person to touch it. The master can be changed at the order of the old master.
*The person wearing the wig obeys all commands of the wig's master.
*The person does not remember putting on the wig, nor anything that happened under its influence unless commanded to do so by the master.
*The wig's master is immune to the wig's power, it acts like a normal wig on the master.
*While the wig can only have one master at a time, the original master can return ownership to himself at any time, and can decide to remain immune to the wig's power when transferring ownership. Only the original master can do this. Any subsequent masters become vulnerable to the wig's power when they transfer ownership.
*The wig can alter memories, but the person returns to normal after 24 hours, or whenever the master chooses.
*The master can brainwash himself with the wig but returns to normal after 24 hours, or whenever the master chooses.

Other than that, have fun!
